About Me

Hi! I'm Arya Soni, I have passion for inventing stuff, designing solutions and learning new things.

I am well versed in data structures and algorithms of Python and capable of designing and developing interactive and user-friendly iOS App. I like solving problems and creating solutions.

I am fascinated by Artificial Intelligence and the concept of Self-Driving cars and am in search of opportunities that provide more hands-on and practical experience in these areas. I am enthusiastic about breaking into fields I haven't ventured into so far and would love to be a part of any project that helps me develop.
